title: Gauntlet™
notes:
Game crashes straight away. The work around is to add this to your launch options PROTON_USE_WINED3D11=1 PROTON_NO_ESYNC=1 %command%
As far as I can tell from 30 minutes of testing, the game runs smoothly.

minor issues
1 - crashes at exi
2 - crashes with big picture mode (unconfirmed
